paper_abstract: In this paper, we investigate approximate quadratic forms related to the functional equations f(x + y, z + w) + f(x - y, z - w) = 2f(x, z) + 2f(y, w) and f(x + y, z - w) + f(x - y, z + w) = 2f (x, z) + 2f (y, w) in paranormed spaces.
paper_title: APPROXIMATE QUADRATIC FORMS IN PARANORMED SPACES
